entry.title: Pt. 1 Planning Stage
entry.summary: About the dogs Information about the dogs to collect and store Name Gender Breed/Mix Age Weight Birthday Activity stats for dogs to store and use Last hike date Total number of hikes Badges, trophys, prizes to recognize a dogs achievements The details We use our own leashes and harnesses etc. so we don’t need information about these items. entry.title: Dogwalking App
entry.summary: The scope of the project: Use Django’s tools to create a skeleton website and application. Create models to represent our application’s data. Use the Django admin site to populate our site’s data. Create views to retrieve specific data in response to different requests, and templates to render the data as HTML to be displayed in the browser. Create mappers to associate different URL...
